column1:
OKAY LOOK: I can't even believe I have to say this: The corona virus is not the same thing as the #COVID19. 
It's like how there are 1000s of different flu types. I saw a tweet earlier about Lysol saying "corona virus" on the label, but that doesn't mean THIS #coronavirus.
STOP. https://twitter.com/BadFoxGraphics/status/1233169451748667392 …
